ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm.  The fool thinks I can t move.  Even as he lowered his hands he saw the demon bot move.  He uses an energy burst to move himself forward completely

From: "Wilthram Ponth" <Rudra656@...>

::Enertron::
     "Hmm.  The fool thinks I can't move."  Even as he lowered his 
hands he saw the demon bot move.  He uses an energy burst to move 
himself forward completely avoiding the bite and flame slash.  The 
flame blast incinerated the back of his shirt but did no real harm.  
Before he stopped he spun about and saw the incoming shots.  He knew 
what to do though, it was ingrained in his spark.  He put his hands 
together in front of him and through them out to the sidescreating a 
small barrier of energy destroying the shots.  He retaliates by 
closing his fists and placing them together in front of him aimed at 
Galvatron.  As he concentratesa ball of energy envelops his hands.  
The ball grows to the size of a basketball.  "BEAM CANNON!"  A column 
of energy is launched from his hands directly at Galvatron.
